layout.title: WhatsDice - Real time dice roller
layout.description: WhatsDice is a real time dice roller that can be used in RPG adventures on WhatsApp.

homepage.name: WhatsDice
homepage.title: Real time dice roller.
homepage.description: WhatsDice it's not a simple dice roller. It works like a chat of real time results. WhatsDice can be used for RPG adventures on WhatsApp to make public the results for everyone who access the same URL address.
homepage.twitterText: WhatsDice is a real time dice roller that can be used in RPG adventures on WhatsApp.
